title: TOOLTIP__EVENT event schema
description: called for most Popup component events

tooltip_name.description: Text shown in the tooltip on hover

tooltip_content.description: Identifing text for the content shown if the tooltip triggers a modal or other

link.description: if the Popup trigger is a link , the href HTML attribute of that link

stopPropagation.description: whether or not to keep the event from bubbling up the DOM
